titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that 5 additional points be granted, on the examination for entrance into the competitive service, to certain veterans who do not currently qualify for any such additional points.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 5/16/1995--Introduced. Amends Federal civil service law to entitle certain honorably discharged veterans who served on active duty to five additional points on examinations for entrance into the competitive service.
